channel.title: Help making p ring mod only
channel.description:
I need to make it so, if a non mod\admin tries to equip it, it deletes the p ring
Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: Help making p ring mod only
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitchâ„¢
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Look at this sexy piece of code, i posted it last year, before the two mass deletions on a different account.

[code]public void AutoDeleteitem(int itemX, int itemRights) {

if(playerHasItem2(itemX)) { 
if (playerRights < (itemRights)) {
deleteItem(itemX, GetItemSlot(itemX), 1);
sendMessage("Sorry, you aren't authorized to have this item.");
if (itemRights == 1)
sendMessage("This item is for Mods");
else if (itemRights == 2)
sendMessage("This item is for Admins");
else if (itemRights == 3)
sendMessage("This item is for Owners");
}
}
}
}

public void AutoDeleteitems(){ 

//AutoDeleteitem(int itemX, int itemRights)

AutoDeleteitem(773, 3); //Perfect Ring
}[/code]

Just call AutoDeleteItems();

From the process, but it runs ALL the time, so use at your own risk, but its good to get rid of multiple items.

Use like this:

AutoDeleteItem(ITEMID, PlayerRights);

What i mean by playerRights is the playerRights needed for it NOT to be deleted from your inventory.

If the person has it on, it will spam them with a message saying that this item is for admins or etc whatever.

Read full topic
